Name: Cafe Oslo
Review Text: Nice cafe, typical Norwegian selection of baked goods and coffee. Also beer on tap and wine. I like the high ceilings and tall windows.

Name: Cafe Oslo
Review Text:
Really nice Cappuccino and Croissant on saturday mornings. They're tired on evenings though so focus on the morning pastries.
Haven't tried the food but the ambience is nice and I agree about the toilets, clean and nice.

Name: Cafe Oslo
Review Text: Kafe Oslo, and the Litterature House is a great place to chill with a beer outside in summer, or a coffee indoors the rest of the year. They serve great beer, my favourite is the Kondrad Stout.

Name: Cafe Oslo
Review Text: Great service and food!

Name: Cafe Oslo
Review Text: "Hey, i am not a waitress, i am a student of literature and i am here to meet important author", the waitress signaled .. Pardon me, this was just some piece of fiction literature. However, not really a place for tourists.

Name: Cafe Oslo
Review Text: The prawn sandwich was served with German efficiency and was exquisite.

Name: Cafe Oslo
Review Text: Unique place to visit if you want a bit quiet place to drink or eat.

Name: Cafe Oslo
Review Text: Went here for lunch. Food was good and service was quick.
